title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately causes changes
OB: When a working set is removed, changes occur immediately.
EB: When a working set is removed, changes should not occur immediately.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and then delete the first one.
